data.text: Descript 1 videodisc (approximately 143 min.) : sound, color ; 4 3/4 in. two-dimensional moving image tdi rdacontent video v rdamedia videodisc vd rdacarrier System Det DVD, NTSC, region 1, widescreen (1.78:1, 16x9) presentation; Dolby Digital 5.1, 2.0. Cast Robert Downey, Jr., Scarlett Johansson, Jeremy Renner, Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth, Tom Hiddleston, Gwyneth Paltrow, Samuel L. Jackson, Stellan Skarsgård, Paul Bettany. Credits Director of photography, Seamus McGarvey ; editors, Jeffrey Ford, Lisa Lassek ; music, Alan Silvestri ; story by Zak Penn and Joss Whedon. Note Videodisc release of the 2012 motion picture. Audience MPAA rating: PG-13; for intense sequences of sci-fi violence and action throughout, and a mild drug reference. Summary Nick Fury of S.H.I.E.L.D. brings together a team of superhumans to form The Avengers to help save the Earth from Loki and his army. Note Special features: Assembling the ultimate team featurette; audio commentary director Joss Whedon. English, dubbed French, or dubbed Spanish dialogue; optional subtitles French or Spanish; English subtitles for the deaf and hard of hearing; described video. Subject Avengers (Fictitious characters) -- Drama. Iron Man (Fictitious character) -- Drama. America, Captain (Fictitious character) -- Drama. Incredible Hulk (Fictitious character) -- Drama. Fury, Nick (Fictitious character) -- Drama. Superheroes -- Drama. Good and evil -- Drama. Genre Superhero films. Action and adventure films. Science fiction films. Fiction films. Feature films. Feature films -- United States. Video recordings for the hearing impaired. Video recordings for people with visual disabilities. Local Subj DVD videodiscs. Alt Author Feige, Kevin, producer. Whedon, Joss, 1964-, screenwriter, director. Penn, Zak, 1968- Downey, Robert, Jr., 1965- actor. Johansson, Scarlett, 1984-, actor. Renner, Jeremy, actor. Ruffalo, Mark, actor. Hemsworth, Chris, actor. Hiddleston, Tom, actor. Paltrow, Gwyneth, 1972-, actor. Jackson, Samuel L., actor. Skarsgård, Stellan, actor. Bettany, Paul, 1971-, actor. Silvestri, Alan, composer (expression) Marvel Studios. Paramount Pictures Corporation. Marvel Entertainment Group. Buena Vista Home Entertainment (Firm) Unif Title Marvel's The Avengers (Motion picture : 2012) Note Title on container: Marvel's The Avengers ISBN 6314729971 : DVD ISBN/ISSN 786936819175
